title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: We’re reading about FDA rejecting a rare disease drug, a warning to a Hims compounding pharmacy and more
description: A bipartisan group of US lawmakers took another shot at legislation to boost antibiotic development, and other pharma news.
content: A bipartisan group of US lawmakers took another shot at legislation to boost antibiotic development, and other pharma news.
